title: Episode 40 - NSA in the Early Cold War
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we explore the origins of  the NSA in the early Cold War. When did the US start to monitor Soviet communications Traffic ? Learn about Signals Intelligence's complex relation with US democratic institutions and how work on breaking soviet codes influenced the development of the computer.
